Key Match Events: Bridges and Anunoby scored 18 and 18 points respectively through 20 minutes of action
Towns added 14 points in the third quarter, dominating the Nets' interior
Post-Match Reflections: The Nets' wheels began to fall off out of the break, although it wasn't for a lack of effort
The Nets can't ever be truly counted out, but their supporting cast couldn't follow suit in the comeback charge
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nets are now reeling after a hot start to the 2024-25 campaign
Brooklyn returns home on Tuesday to take on the Philadelphia 76ers in its second NBA Cup appearance
Others: The Nets' starting five had shortcomings, Brooklyn looked significantly less impressive than it had just 48 hours prior
The final tally looked slightly better due to garbage time buckets from the Nets' reserves
